customhtml2_11446045._customHTML:
Say Bonjour to the All-New

MONT BLANC

The ultimate long-distance trail shoe.

video._description: Mont Blanc Launch Video - Altra Running

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML: Inspired by the highest mountain in the Alps comes the Mont Blanc, the ultimate long distance trail shoe.

image._alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436._customHTML:
MAX CUSHION FOR ULTRA EXCURSIONS

Our Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam brings ultimate comfort to the trail. This max cushion is designed for the longest, hardest trail runs.

customhtml2_copy._customHTML:
ULTIMATE GRIP
Vibram® LiteBase is an innovative technology that reduces the overall sole weight while maintaining Vibram® quality in grip, traction, and durability.

image._alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop._customHTML:
MORE WITH LESS

We strategically added material resulting in a lightweight, breathable, design for all-day trail excursions.

A FIT DESIGNED FOR ALL-DAY PERFORMANCE

The Mont Blanc features our Standard FootShape™ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra Running® shoes. This feature allows your toes to relax and sit naturally for miles on rugged terrain, encouraging the best performance for your long-distance run.

content._jcr:description: Say bonjour to the all-new Mont Blanc from Altra Running. The ultimate long-distance trail running shoe, with max cushion for your longest, hardest trail runs.
content._jcr:title: Mont Blanc
